skills.Name: Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 and M. Atk. by 1.9.

skills.Name: Robe Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 8.6 when equipped with a robe.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: When equipped with light armor, increases P. Def. by 6.3, Casting Spd. by 91%, Atk. Spd. by 25%, and MP Recovery Bonus by 20%.

skills.Name: Anti Magic
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 20 and Magic Damage Resistance by 5%.

skills.Name: Boost Mana
skills.Description: Increases Max MP by 30.

skills.Name: Eva's Restoration
skills.Description: Eva's image is crystal clear in your mind, as you restore power within your ally. Restores 160 HP and an additional 10 HP every second for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Eva's Power
skills.Description: Call upon Eva's Power to calm and heal the target. Restores 20 HP per second for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Might
skills.Description: Increases P. Skill by 8% for 20 mins.

skills.Name: Resurrection
skills.Description: Resurrects a corpse.

skills.Name: Sleep
skills.Description: Causes the enemy to sleep for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Might of Heaven
skills.Description: Punish yourself, to punish the target. Inflicts divine damage on the target dealing ul holy

skills.Name: Invocation
skills.Description: Recovers 10 MP every second for 30 seconds.

skills.Name: Recharge
skills.Description: Recovers 50 MP. Cannot be used by classes that have Recharge skill.

skills.Name: Summon Team Mate
skills.Description: Summons the selected party member to your location. Requires 1 Summoning Crystal.

skills.Name: Fast Spell Casting

skills.Name: Eva's Restoration
skills.Description: Eva's image is crystal clear in your mind, as you restore power within your ally. Restores 195 HP and an additional 12 HP every second for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Eva's Power
skills.Description: Call upon Eva's Power to calm and heal the target. Restores 25 HP per second for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Eva's Embrace
skills.Description: You become a beacon of Eva's Power, restoring 100 Power on all party members and restore 10 HP per second for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Sleep
skills.Description: Causes the enemy to sleep for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Dryad Root
skills.Description: Immobilizes the enemy for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Shield
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 8% for 20 minutes.

skills.Name: Might of Heaven
skills.Description: Punish yourself, to punish the target. Inflicts divine damage on the target dealing ul holy

skills.Name: Vitalize
skills.Description: Recovers HP with 360 Power and cures minor poison/bleeding.
